requirement_text:
As a web application visitor, I want to create an account, so that I can have personal preferences in the web application.
As an IFA administrator, I want to have a dashboard on the web application, so that I can easily check leagues and teams information.
As an IFA administrator, I want to enable free access to all data regarding games, teams, and leagues, so that system transparency is improved.
As an IFA administrator, I want to allow each visitor to register in the web application, so that they can use more features offered by the system.
As a fan, I want to register for notifications related to players, teams, or leagues, so that I can follow my favourite entities regularly.
As a web application visitor, I want to access the web application anywhere in the world, so that I do not depend on location.
As an IFA administrator, I want each account to have a unique username and password, so that login issues are avoided.
As a team, I want to post news on social media through the web application, so that I can keep my fans updated.
As a fan, I want to add comments to social media content on the web application, so that I can express my opinions and thoughts online.
As a fan, I want to be updated about my purchased tickets for matches, so that I am notified if a game is postponed.
As a fan, I want to use the application in my native language, so that I can understand the provided information.
As a fan, I want fast response time while using the system, so that I do not lose time waiting for answers.
As a fan, I want to access match statistics, so that I am informed about what happened during a match.
As a fan, I want to access analytics of my favourite team, so that I can predict upcoming matches.
As a fan, I want to choose the topics I am interested in within the web application, so that I can instantly access relevant information.
As an IFA administrator, I want the web application to support up to 50,000 concurrent users, so that accessibility problems are avoided.
As a referee, I want to have an application containing a list of possible match events, so that I can instantly provide information to the system.
As a referee, I want to use a small mobile device to report match events, so that the system can provide updates from each game.
As a referee, I want match data to be reported automatically when events occur, so that information is updated continuously.
As a referee, I want to provide information digitally, so that data transmission is faster.
As an IFA administrator, I want to generate statistics from referees’ live updates, so that fans are informed efficiently.
As an IFA administrator, I want to create a scheduling platform, so that schedules can be suggested to all stakeholders.
As an IFA administrator, I want to handle scheduling digitally, so that the scheduling process is more efficient.
As an IFA administrator, I want to define rules for scheduling games, so that bias can be avoided.
As an IFA representative, I want to check and approve schedules, so that bias can be avoided.
As a league, I want to make changes to the schedule, so that it can be adjusted to teams and referees.
As an IFA representative, I want to receive explicit reasons for schedule changes, so that bias can be avoided.
As an IFA representative, I want to confirm every change in the schedule, so that bias can be avoided.
As a team, I want each match we play to be at least four days apart, so that the team has enough time to prepare.
As a referee, I want the system to connect me with the games I am assigned to, so that I can easily follow information about my matches.
As a referee, I want to be notified if a game is postponed, so that I can reschedule my plans.
As an IFA administrator, I want each schedule to be adjusted to the league’s time zone, so that misunderstandings are avoided.
As an IFA administrator, I want to define budgetary policies and rules, so that fraud in team budgeting systems is avoided.
As an IFA administrator, I want to access teams’ budgets through the web application, so that I can continuously monitor them.
As an IFA administrator, I want to receive reports of each team’s transactions, so that I have a clear overview of team budgets.
As an IFA administrator, I want to restrict access to budgeting information to IFA administration and teams, so that budget confidentiality is maintained.
As an IFA administrator, I want to be alerted about deviations from budget rules, so that fraud can be prevented.
As an IFA administrator, I want to have a single communication medium for all stakeholders, so that communication is improved.
As a team, I want to assign a responsible person to manage the team’s profile in the system, so that team needs are represented.
As a CIO, I want to merge multiple existing systems into one, so that communication and transparency among stakeholders are improved.
As a CIO, I want to have different user interfaces for different stakeholders, so that each stakeholder has an interface suited to their needs.

use_cases.name: Register Account
use_cases.description: Allows visitors to create personal accounts in the web application as enabled by the IFA administrator.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a web application visitor, I want to create an account so that I can have personal preferences in the web application.
As an ifa administrator, I want to allow each visitor to register in the web application so that they can use more features offered by the system.

use_cases.name: Access Web Application
use_cases.description: Allows visitors to access the web application from any location via the internet.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a web application visitor, I want to access the web application anywhere in the world so that I do not depend on location.

use_cases.name: Provide Competition Data Access
use_cases.description: Enables free access to games, teams, and leagues data to improve transparency.

user_stories.original_sentence: As an ifa administrator, I want to enable free access to all data regarding games, teams, and leagues so that system transparency is improved.
As an ifa administrator, I want to enable free access to all data regarding games, teams, and leagues so that system transparency is improved.
As an ifa administrator, I want to enable free access to all data regarding games, teams, and leagues so that system transparency is improved.

use_cases.name: Engage via Dashboard and Social Feed
use_cases.description: Provides a dashboard and social feed where administrators view information, teams post news, and fans comment and choose interests.

user_stories.original_sentence: As an ifa administrator, I want to have a dashboard on the web application so that I can easily check leagues and teams information.
As a team, I want to post news on social media through the web application so that I can keep my fans updated.
As a fan, I want to add comments to social media content on the web application so that I can express my opinions and thoughts online.
As a fan, I want to choose the topics I am interested in within the web application so that I can instantly access relevant information.

use_cases.name: Monitor Team Budgets
use_cases.description: Allows the IFA administrator to access team budgets and receive transaction reports for financial oversight.

user_stories.original_sentence: As an ifa administrator, I want to access teams’ budgets through the web application so that I can continuously monitor them.
As an ifa administrator, I want to receive reports of each team’s transactions so that I have a clear overview of team budgets.

use_cases.name: Assign Profile Manager
use_cases.description: Allows a team to appoint a responsible person to manage its profile in the system.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a team, I want to assign a responsible person to manage the team’s profile in the system so that team needs are represented.

use_cases.name: Manage Game Schedules
use_cases.description: Supports defining scheduling rules, reviewing, approving, modifying schedules, and handling schedule change confirmations.

user_stories.original_sentence: As an ifa administrator, I want to define rules for scheduling games so that bias can be avoided.
As an ifa representative, I want to check and approve schedules so that bias can be avoided.
As an ifa representative, I want to check and approve schedules so that bias can be avoided.
As a league, I want to make changes to the schedule so that it can be adjusted to teams and referees.
As an ifa representative, I want to receive explicit reasons for schedule changes so that bias can be avoided.
As an ifa representative, I want to confirm every change in the schedule so that bias can be avoided.

use_cases.name: Notify Match Changes
use_cases.description: Sends updates about tickets and game postponements to fans and referees.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a fan, I want to be updated about my purchased tickets for matches so that I am notified if a game is postponed.
As a referee, I want to be notified if a game is postponed so that I can reschedule my plans.

use_cases.name: Record Match Events
use_cases.description: Enables referees to view event options and digitally report match events and information in real time.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a referee, I want to have an application containing a list of possible match events so that I can instantly provide information to the system.
As a referee, I want to use a small mobile device to report match events so that the system can provide updates from each game.
As a referee, I want to provide information digitally so that data transmission is faster.

use_cases.name: Integrate Stakeholder Systems
use_cases.description: Merges existing systems into a unified platform with tailored interfaces for different stakeholder groups.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a cio, I want to merge multiple existing systems into one so that communication and transparency among stakeholders are improved.
As a cio, I want to have different user interfaces for different stakeholders so that each stakeholder has an interface suited to their needs.

use_cases.name: Define Budget Rules
use_cases.description: Allows the IFA administrator to set budgetary policies and rules for team budgeting.

user_stories.original_sentence: As an ifa administrator, I want to define budgetary policies and rules so that fraud in team budgeting systems is avoided.
As an ifa administrator, I want to define budgetary policies and rules so that fraud in team budgeting systems is avoided.

use_cases.name: Control Budget Access
use_cases.description: Restricts access to budgeting information to authorized IFA administrators and teams.

user_stories.original_sentence: As an ifa administrator, I want to restrict access to budgeting information to ifa administration and teams so that budget confidentiality is maintained.

use_cases.name: Alert Budget Deviations
use_cases.description: Notifies the IFA administrator about deviations from defined budget rules.

user_stories.original_sentence: As an ifa administrator, I want to be alerted about deviations from budget rules so that fraud can be prevented.

use_cases.name: Register for Notifications
use_cases.description: Allows fans to subscribe to notifications about specific players, teams, or leagues.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a fan, I want to register for notifications related to players, teams, or leagues so that I can follow my favourite entities regularly.
As a fan, I want to register for notifications related to players, teams, or leagues so that I can follow my favourite entities regularly.
As a fan, I want to register for notifications related to players, teams, or leagues so that I can follow my favourite entities regularly.

use_cases.name: View Match Analytics
use_cases.description: Provides generation and access to match statistics and team analytics for fans and administrators.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a fan, I want to access match statistics so that I am informed about what happened during a match.
As a fan, I want to access analytics of my favourite team so that I can predict upcoming matches.
As an ifa administrator, I want to generate statistics from referees’ live updates so that fans are informed efficiently.

use_cases.name: Use Native Language
use_cases.description: Allows fans to use the application in their preferred native language.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a fan, I want to use the application in my native language so that I can understand the provided information.

use_cases.name: Provide Scheduling Platform
use_cases.description: Provides a digital scheduling platform and single communication medium to manage game schedules for all stakeholders.

user_stories.original_sentence: As an ifa administrator, I want to create a scheduling platform so that schedules can be suggested to all stakeholders.
As an ifa administrator, I want to handle scheduling digitally so that the scheduling process is more efficient.
As an ifa administrator, I want to have a single communication medium for all stakeholders so that communication is improved.
